```{r}
library(rvest)
```

```{r}
urlCalendar <- "https://messivsronaldo.net/calendar-year-stats/"
pageCalendar <- read_html(urlCalendar)
```

```{r}
div.html <- html_nodes(pageCalendar, "ul")
str(div.html)
```

```{r}
messiTable <- html_ul(div.html[[11]]) %>% as_tibble()
```
